entry.title: Archive Post 10: Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter, Part 4 (2003)

link.title: Archive Post 10: Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter, Part 4 (2003)

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This post will share issues of Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter published in the 4th year (2003) and received or scanned by the team.

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces).
This is a joint project with Kannan Subrahmanyan from Australia.
For Part 5, please see Part 5.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

2003-0110 Sahaja Yoga Australian Newsletter (CCT Collection) (12 pages, original file, uploaded on 2023-0727)

entry.title: Archive Post 6: Articles
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This post will share newspaper articles received or scanned by the team.

Please enjoy and kindly share with all our brothers and sisters. If files are downloaded using the download buttons/arrows, please kindly do not change the names of the files (modulo replacements of underscores by spaces).

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

A1.

1990-0606 and 0607 Articles (Chinese) in ‘World Journal’, 141-07 20th Avenue, Whitestone, NY, U.S.A. (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A2.

1990-0800 Newspaper Photos with Caption published in Studenstké Listy, Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0518), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A3.

1993-0724 Article ‘7. čakra pro každého’ (7th chakra for everyone) by Viktor Šlajchrt in section Kultura, Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A4.

1993-0726 Article ‘Indická bohyne v Praze’ (Indian goddess in Prague) by Jana Blažková, Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0601), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A5.

1993-0726 Article ‘Indka milu české lidi’ (Indian lady loves Czech people) by František Lauer published in the daily newspaper Blesk (Year 2, Number 170), Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A6.

1993-0726 Article ‘Léčila me bohyne’ (I was healed by a goddess), Pargue, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0531), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A7.

1994-0900 Article ‘Zujme si boty - Matka přichází’ (Take off your shoes - Mother is coming) by Věra Mosková on the 0904 Public Program, published in the daily newspaper Blesk, Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0531), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A8.

1995-0800 Article ‘Matka Nirmala Devi přijíždí do Prahy Jóga radosti a poznání’ (Mother Nirmala Devi arrives in Prague Yoga of joy and knowledge), Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0518), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A9.

1995-0807 Article about the Arrival on 0806 with Photo, Prague, Czech Republic (David Burša Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0601), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A10.

1996-0717 Article ‘Prisli Jsme si pro Kousek lásky kterou rozdávála Šri Mátadží’ by Eva Sýkorová published in Večernik Praha, Czech Republic, (David Burša Collection) (2 pages, uploaded on 2023-0508), Source: Šrí Mátadží v ČR 2


A11.

2001-1228 Article (Marathi) in Ratnagiri Times, Front Page, Maharashtra, India (Balwant Kumbhojkar Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A12.

2003-1200 Article ‘शिव और शक्ति का वास्तविक मिलान’ (Real Union of Shiva and Shakti) (Hindi), published in Shri Mahashakti Sagar, 4th year, issue 10 (Balwant Kumbhojkar Collection) (2 pages, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A13.

2012-0319 A Tribute ‘Sahaja Yoga for Stress Free Life and Good Health’, Free Press Journal, Page 18, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India (M. B. Ratnannavar Collection) (1 pages, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A14.

2012-0703 A Tribute to Shri Mataji Nirmala Devi on Guru Purnima, Free Press Journal, Page 26, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India (M. B. Ratnannavar Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A15.

2013-0321 Article Celebrating the Birth Day of Shri Mataji Nirmala Devi ‘Sahaja Yoga - A Silent Move Towards Transformation’, Free Press Journal, Page 3, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India (M. B. Ratnannavar Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508)


A16.

2018-1026 Article ‘Unite Nations through Meditation’, Free Press Journal, Page 26, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India (M. B. Ratnannavar Collection) (1 page, uploaded on 2023-0508)

entry.title: Archive Post 4: First Annual Report
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

Our subteam has started contributing to the Archives of the database via specific posts (so far 5 pdf files in 2 specific posts, on Divine Cool Breeze Magazine and on Letters and Press Releases) and via the table at the link Data Table, which currently has 1,280 rows and which is projected that in due time will have a number of rows between 4,000 and 21,000. About 150 total specific posts are envisioned and we will gradually reach there.

First Summary of the 14 numerical indices.
i. Rows of the Table: 1,280.
ii. Organized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,301.
iii. Estimated unorganized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,500.
iv. Specific posts: 2.
v. Estimated specific posts to be started: 148.
vi. Total links: 146.
vii. External Links: 141 (DCB: 141).
viii. CCT Links: 5.
ix. Total files uploaded: 5.
x. Total pages uploaded: 78.
xi. Other files (originals, received, etc.) uploaded: 0.
xii. Other pages uploaded: 0.
xiii. Files scanned and cropped by CCT: 5.
xiv. Pages scanned and cropped by CCT: 78.

We thank you in advance for any help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Archives Subteam
entry.summary: Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs, Our subteam has started contributing to the Archives of the database via specific posts (so far 5 pdf files in 2 specific posts, on Divine Cool Breeze Magazine and on Letters and Press Releases) and via the table at the link Data Table, which currently has 1,280 rows and which is projected that in due time will have a number of rows between 4,000 and 21,000. About 150 total specific posts are envisioned and we will gradually reach there. First Summary of the 14 numerical indices. i. Rows of the Table: 1,280. ii. Organized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,301. iii. Estimated unorganized rows left to be added to the Table: 1,500. iv. Specific posts: 2. v. Estimated specific posts to be started: 148. vi. Total links: 146. vii. External Links: 141 (DCB: 141). viii. CCT Links: 5. ix. Total files uploaded: 5. x. Total pages uploaded: 78. xi. Other files (originals, received, etc.) uploaded: 0. xii. Other pages uploaded: 0. xiii. Files scanned and cropped by CCT: 5. xiv. Pages scanned and cropped by CCT: 78. We thank you in advance for any help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com Jay Śhrī Mātājī! The Archives Subteam
